name: KidneyDiseaseFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask Kidney Disease Facts to give me a kidney fact”
”Alexa, open Kidney Disease Facts and tell me a kidney fact”
”Alexa, open Kidney Disease Facts and tell me a fact about kidney disease”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kidney disease facts
des:
This skill tells about the growing problem of kidney disease and gives information about how common it is, what causes it, methods of treatment, and what happens if the kidneys no longer work.
This is for education and information purposes only and is not meant to take the place of medical advice from your doctor. See your doctor for your particular health concerns.
Additional information: https://www.niddk.nih.gov/health-information/health-statistics/kidney-disease
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
